evidence.claim: HydraMed utilizes AWS services for its cloud infrastructure.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring secure transaction of health data.
They implement EDI X12 transaction sets for interoperability within healthcare systems.
Uses FHIR standards for exchanging healthcare information.
Adopts HL7 protocols for data exchange in healthcare.

icp.icp_reason: Uses HIPAA-compliant EDI and is likely involved in healthcare transactions.
